snippet: Katherine Boo, the author of “Behind the Beautiful Forevers: Life, Death and Hope in a Mumbai Undercity,” lets a story of poverty tell itself.
abstract: Journalist Katherine Boo overcame cultural and language barriers as well as her own health concerns to write the book Behind the Beautiful Forevers: Life, Death and Hope in a Mumbai Undercity, which gives voice to India's slum dwellers.
lead_paragraph: Katherine Boo, the author of “Behind the Beautiful Forevers: Life, Death and Hope in a Mumbai Undercity,” lets a story of poverty tell itself.

headline.seo: Katherine Boo on Her Book ‘Behind the Beautiful Forevers’
headline.main: An Outsider Gives Voice to Slumdogs
headline.print_headline: An Outsider Gives Voice To Slumdogs
